item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, March 23, 2025 at 3:00 AM UTC
item.description:
1. NixOS and reproducible builds could have detected the xz backdoor (178 points | 65 comments)
2. Map Features in OpenStreetMap with Computer Vision (187 points | 43 comments)
3. PyTorch Internals: Ezyang's Blog (275 points | 21 comments)
4. Tencent's 'Hunyuan-T1'–The First Mamba-Powered Ultra-Large Model (150 points | 74 comments)
5. Mathematical Methods for Physics [pdf] (70 points | 29 comments)
6. The polar vortex is hitting the brakes (176 points | 145 comments)
7. Landrun: Sandbox any Linux process using Landlock, no root or containers (260 points | 92 comments)
8. Through a Glass Lushly: Michalina Janoszanka's Reverse Paintings (Ca. 1920s) (16 points | discuss)
9. Quitting an Intel x86 Hypervisor (45 points | 2 comments)
10. Domu Technology Inc. (YC S24) Is Hiring a Vibe Coder ( | hide)
11. The Vectrex Computer (40 points | 12 comments)
12. Differential Geometry: A First Course in Curves and Surfaces [pdf] (114 points | 5 comments)
13. Trapping misbehaving bots in an AI Labyrinth (118 points | 65 comments)
14. 300-year-old Polish beech voted Tree of the Year (45 points | 7 comments)
15. Magical Instant Bullets (36 points | 19 comments)
16. Show HN: FastOpenAPI – automated docs for many Python frameworks (110 points | 53 comments)
17. Derivatives and Logarithms of 3D Transforms (34 points | 1 comment)
18. Paul A. M. Dirac, Interview by Friedrich Hund (1982) [video] (86 points | 19 comments)
19. Optimizing Brainfuck interpreter in the C preprocessor (22 points | 1 comment)
20. California Attorney General issues consumer alert for 23andMe customers (295 points | 206 comments)
21. Bra and KET: String Interpolation in AmigaDOS (50 points | 1 comment)
22. Crabtime: Zig’s Comptime in Rust (394 points | 141 comments)
23. Show HN: We made an MCP server so Cursor can debug Node.js on its own (64 points | 15 comments)
24. Understanding R1-Zero-Like Training: A Critical Perspective (101 points | 13 comments)
25. Scallop – A Language for Neurosymbolic Programming (191 points | 51 comments)
26. Hubble Captures Vivid Auroras in Jupiter's Atmosphere (2016) (46 points | 7 comments)
27. Blue Ghost lander captures sunset shots on moon before falling silent (70 points | 27 comments)
28. When you deleted /lib on Linux while still connected via SSH (2022) (129 points | 73 comments)
29. Italy demands Google poison DNS under strict Piracy Shield law (130 points | 89 comments)
30. Next.js version 15.2.3 has been released to address a security vulnerability (122 points | 90 comments)
